parameter.name: fileSystemName
parameter.description: The name of the file system.

parameter.name: downloadLocation
parameter.description: The destination path to save the downloaded file.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.

parameter.name: leaseId
parameter.description: The lease ID of the file.

parameter.name: ifUnmodifiedSince
parameter.description: The operation will be performed only if the resource has not been modified since the specified time.

parameter.name: ifMatch
parameter.description: The operation will be performed only if the resource's ETag matches the specified ETag value.

parameter.name: ifModifiedSince
parameter.description: The operation will be performed only if the resource has been modified since the specified time.

parameter.name: ifNoneMatch
parameter.description: The operation will be performed only if the resource's ETag does not match the specified ETag value.

parameter.name: blockSize
parameter.description: The size of the block in MB.

parameter.name: maxSingleDownloadSize
parameter.description: The maximum size of a single download in bytes.

parameter.name: maxConcurrency
parameter.description: The maximum number of blocks that can be downloaded in parallel.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: The offset in bytes from where the download should start.

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: The number of bytes to be downloaded.

parameter.name: maxRetryRequests
parameter.description: The maximum number of retry requests.

parameter.name: rangeGetContentMd5
parameter.description: Whether the contentMD5 for the specified file range should be returned.
